languages.text: "Вы правы, о важном я привык говорить в душевных разговорах". {n}Энрих дарит искреннюю улыбку.{/n} "Как сейчас с вами".
"You are right: I'm used to talking about important things in heart-to-heart conversations." {n}Einrich flashes you a genuine smile.{/n} "Like the one we are having right now."
languages.original_text: "Вы правы, о важном я привык говорить в душевных разговорах". {n}Энрих дарит искреннюю улыбку.{/n} "Как сейчас с вами".

traits.locale_text: "You are right, I'm used to talking about important things in heart-to-heart conversations." {n}Einrich flashes you a genuine smile.{/n} "Like the one we are having right now."

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. J'ai pour habitude de discuter des sujets importants, dans les conversations à cœur ouvert. Comme celle que nous avons maintenant, {n}ajoute Einrich avec un sourire sincère.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are right: I'm used to talking about important things in heart-to-heart conversations." {n}Einrich flashes you a genuine smile.{/n} "Like the one we are having right now."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. J'ai pour habitude de discuter des sujets importants, dans les conversations à cœur ouvert. Comme celle que nous avons maintenant, {n}ajoute Einrich avec un sourire sincère.{/n}

languages.text: «Tiene razón: estoy acostumbrado a hablar de las cosas importantes en conversaciones sinceras». {n}Einrich te muestra una sonrisa genuina.{/n} «Como esta».
languages.original_text: "You are right: I'm used to talking about important things in heart-to-heart conversations." {n}Einrich flashes you a genuine smile.{/n} "Like the one we are having right now."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón: estoy acostumbrado a hablar de las cosas importantes en conversaciones sinceras». {n}Einrich te muestra una sonrisa genuina.{/n} «Como esta».

languages.text: “您说得没错，我更喜欢在面对面谈话中互相交心，谈论重要的事情。”{n}艾因里奇对你露出了真诚的微笑。{/n}“就像现在这样。”
languages.original_text: "You are right: I'm used to talking about important things in heart-to-heart conversations." {n}Einrich flashes you a genuine smile.{/n} "Like the one we are having right now."

traits.locale_text: “您说得没错，我更喜欢在面对面谈话中互相交心，谈论重要的事情。”{n}艾因里奇对你露出了真诚的微笑。{/n}“就像现在这样。”

languages.text: 「あなたの言う通り、私は腹を割って重要な話をすることに慣れています」{n}アインリッヒは心からの笑顔を見せた。{/n} 「現在進行形でしていますからね」
languages.original_text: "You are right: I'm used to talking about important things in heart-to-heart conversations." {n}Einrich flashes you a genuine smile.{/n} "Like the one we are having right now."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言う通り、私は腹を割って重要な話をすることに慣れています」{n}アインリッヒは心からの笑顔を見せた。{/n} 「現在進行形でしていますからね」

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht: Ich bin es gewohnt, in vertraulichen Gesprächen über wichtige Dinge zu sprechen." {n}Einrich lässt ein ehrliches Lächeln aufblitzen.{/n} "Wie das, das wir gerade führen."
languages.original_text: "You are right: I'm used to talking about important things in heart-to-heart conversations." {n}Einrich flashes you a genuine smile.{/n} "Like the one we are having right now."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht: Ich bin es gewohnt, in vertraulichen Gesprächen über wichtige Dinge zu sprechen." {n}Einrich lässt ein ehrliches Lächeln aufblitzen.{/n} "Wie das, das wir gerade führen."

languages.text: "Haklısınız. Önemli şeyleri bire bir sohbetlerde konuşmaya alışığımdır." {n}Einrich, samimi bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şu an olduğu gibi."
languages.original_text: "You are right: I'm used to talking about important things in heart-to-heart conversations." {n}Einrich flashes you a genuine smile.{/n} "Like the one we are having right now."
